Articles.Content:
I got frustrated trying to get Large ship constructed, gave up and sent out probe missions.

I am dreading wasting more trying to get parts to dock = Gahhhhhh !!

What to do with these used parts ??
If at first you don't succeed, try try again..
Or launch it all up in one piece

Consider some of the mods - you can get a LV-N that has the power of half a dozen regular LV-Ns, fuel tanks that can hold as much as two or three regular tanks, etc using some of the big-name mods. This can save a lot of parts. You can also use the round batteries, and larger solar panels to cut down on part count.

Finally, when attaching modules to the mothership, bring them in and dock them with a tug rather than under their own power. Then, you can de-orbit the tug or whatever. That way, you don't have to put RCS tanks, ports, batteries, etc on every single module. This can save a lot on parts.

If you are careful and a little creative with the design, you can save 50% or more on parts.

If at first you don't succeed, try try again..

Wisdom.

Or launch it all up in one piece

Wisdom again!
